The Court decided that the recital in an appeal bond, that the judgment in the court below was rendered before A. B., justice of the peace, is good, without adding the county of which he is a justice. The defeet might be supplied by averment and proof in a suit on ,1 „ ,___, the bond,

Anonymous.
